name: paralyze-heal
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures paralysis.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A spray-type medicine for paralysis. It can be used once to free a Pokémon that has been paralyzed.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A spray-type medicine for paralysis. It can be used once to free a Pokémon that has been paralyzed.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A spray-type medicine for treating paralysis. It can be used to free a single Pokémon that has been paralyzed.
